source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_SEQ_00<tab>Hiun excitedly glances to and fro.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_SEQ_00<tab>Hiun promène son regard excité à droite à gauche.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_TODO_00<tab>Obtain liquid hot magma from Hells' Lid.
TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the liquid hot magma to Hiun.

TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_000<tab>Damn! Did you see that!? The devil's clearing his throat again! Ah─it seems you are not familiar with the expression. That is what we say around here whenever Hells' Lid erupts.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_000<tab>T'as vu ça<var 1D /var>? Le diable vient de se racler la gorge. Tu comprends pas<var 1D /var>? Ah ah, c'est ce qu'on dit par ici quand le Couvercle des enfers crache de la lave. Il doit être sacrément pris aujourd'hui, il m'a fait sursauter.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_001<tab>Now then, we best begin moving. There is precious little time! We must go and collect the hot magma before it starts to cool!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_001<tab>Enfin, c'est pas le moment de papoter. Maintenant il faut ramasser cette lave toute fraîche avant qu'elle ne refroidisse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_002<tab>Before we go, though, let me give you a fair warning: if you can't handle a bit of heat or take down a few beasts, I advise you stay here. Few come back alive from these arduous excursions.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_002<tab>Dis, si tu t'en sens capable, qu'est-ce que tu dirais de m'aider<var 1D /var>? Entre la chaleur étouffante et les monstres capables d'y résister, le pied du volcan n'est pas un endroit très accueillant. Ce serait dommage de se priver de quelqu'un d'aussi costaud<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_003<tab>Can I take your silence to mean you will be joining me? Good. Here, take this pot. Fill it with as much magma as you can and bring it back. It gets hot pretty fast, so take care not to burn yourself!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_003<tab>Tiens, c'est ce dont tu auras besoin pour ramasser et transporter la lave. Fais le tour du Couvercle des enfers et ramasses-en un peu. Et avant tout, fais attention à ne pas te brûler<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_004<tab>Put as much magma into the pot as you can, then bring it back. It gets hot really fast, so be sure not to burn yourself!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_004<tab>Essaie de trouver de la lave autour du Couvercle des enfers et d'en ramener un peu ici. Ne t'en mets surtout pas sur les doigts, tu ne t'en sortirais pas qu'avec des cloques...

source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_010<tab>You are back, and without a scratch or burn on you. Impressive. Now, let's see how much magma you managed to bring back.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_010<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>!? Mais c'est que tu as encore tous tes doigts<var 1D /var>! La fournaise ne t'a pas trop brûlé les poumons<var 1D /var>? Et ces <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8CB20302 /var>, ça avance<var 1D /var>? Voyons voir ce que tu me rapportes.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_011<tab>Hoho! Your pot is nearly full! Well done, friend! You collected almost as much as I did and I am a veteran.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_011<tab>Tous les pots sont pleins<var 1D /var>? Bravo<var 1D /var>! T'as l'habitude des milieux hostiles, toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_012<tab>Hm? You want to know what I will be using it for? A fair enough question.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_012<tab>Comment<var 1D /var>? Oh, tu veux savoir ce qu'on en fait.

source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_013<tab>According to ancient legend, a sword forged with molten lava is capable of slaying man and demon alike. As such, this is what we use to make our blades. We pirates like to hedge all our bets. Out at sea, you never know what you'll be running into.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_013<tab>Eh bien, on raconte qu'ajouter un peu de lave en fusion lorsqu'on forge une lame la rend capable de pourfendre d'un unique coup n'importe quel adversaire, fut-il homme ou démon. Un pirate ne saurait se priver du meilleur tranchant qui soit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_015<tab>Thank you for your help. You have saved me a trip here and back to that hellish place. Take this as a reward.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ203_02675_HIUN_000_015<tab>Merci, l'ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. J'apprécie vraiment le coup de main<var 1D /var>! Tiens, prends ça, tu le mérites<var 1D /var>!
